name: Free shipping + Flat rate and hide other methods for WooCommerce
author: PT Woo Plugins (by Webdados)

sections.description:
This plugin creates new ‚ÄúFree Shipping‚Äù and ‚ÄúFlat Rate‚Äù methods, extended from the ones on WooCommerce core, with the possibility of making unavailable any other shipping methods in the same zone when this one is available.

This is set by instance, and not globally like on other plugins, so you can fine-tune which methods are hidden when one (or more) free shipping or flat rate options are active per zone.

There‚Äôs also a new ‚ÄúAll products are in the same shipping class‚Äù option on the ‚ÄúFree shipping requires…‚Äù field, to allow activation of this method only if all the products in the cart belong to a specific shipping class.
On our ‚ÄúFlat Rate‚Äù method a ‚ÄúFlat rate requires…‚Äù field is added with the same option mentioned above.

Header photo by Drew Beamer.

Features:

  • Set a ‚ÄúFree Shipping‚Äù or a ‚ÄúFlat Rate‚Äù method
  • Choose which shipping methods, on the same zone, should be hidden when this one is active
  • Activate the method only if all the products in the cart belong to a specific shipping class

PRO add-on (soon to be released) features:

  • Tell us what would you like to see in a PRO add-on üôÇ
  • Technical support

Other (premium) plugins

Already know our other WooCommerce (premium) plugins?

  • Shop as Client for WooCommerce – Quickly create orders on behalf of your customers
  • Taxonomy/Term and Role based Discounts for WooCommerce – Easily create bulk discount rules for products based on any taxonomy terms (built-in or custom)
  • Simple WooCommerce Order Approval – The hassle-free solution for WooCommerce orders approval before payment
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with the new WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage?

Yes.

Is this plugin compatible with the new WooCommerce block-based Cart and Checkout?

Yes.

I need help, can I get technical support?

This is a free plugin. It‚Äôs our way of giving back to the wonderful WordPress community.

There‚Äôs a support tab on the top of this page, where you can ask the community for help. We‚Äôll try to keep an eye on the forums but we cannot promise to answer support tickets.

If you reach us by email or any other direct contact means, we‚Äôll assume you are in need of urgent, premium, and of course, paid-for support.

Where do I report security vulnerabilities found in this plugin?

You can report any security bugs found in the source code of this plugin through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team will assist you with verification, CVE assignment and take care of notifying the developers of this plugin.

Can I contribute with a translation?

Sure. Go to GlotPress and help us out.
sections.changelog:
2.1 – 2023-12-13

  • Declare WooCommerce block-based Cart and Checkout compatibility
  • Fix jQuery deprecation notices
  • Requires WordPress 5.4
  • Tested with WordPress 6.5-alpha-57159 and WooCommerce 8.4.0

2.0 – 2023-10-16

  • Name change to ‚ÄúFree shipping + Flat rate and hide other methods for WooCommerce‚Äù
  • New ‚ÄúFlat Rate (hide other methods)‚Äù shipping method
  • Fix a bug when more than one instance of the same method are available on the same shipping zone
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4-beta2-56809 and WooCommerce 8.2.0

1.2

  • Remove the own shiping method from the list of methods to hide

1.1 – 2023-09-01

  • Performance improvement
  • Implement WordPress Coding Standards
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4-alpha-56479 and WooCommerce 6.8.0-beta.2

1.0 – 2023-06-05

  • Fix php loop when adding this twice to the same zone
  • High-Performance Order Storage compatible (in beta and only on WooCommerce 7.1 and above)
  • Requires WooCommerce 5.0
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3-alpha-55859 and WooCommerce 6.8.0-beta.2

0.5.0 – 2022-06-29

  • New brand: PT Woo Plugins ü•≥
  • Requires WordPress 5.0, WooCommerce 3.0 and PHP 7.0
  • Tested with WordPress 6.1-alpha-53556 and WooCommerce 6.7.0-beta.2

0.4.2 – 2021-03-11

  • Tested with WordPress 5.8-alpha-50516 and WooCommerce 5.1.0

0.4.1

  • Fix one string textdomain

0.4

  • Add a new ‚ÄúFree shipping requires…‚Äù option ‚ÄúAll products are in the same shipping class‚Äù (sponsored by Intergesso)

0.3

  • Bugfix on admin javascript
  • Fix two strings textdomain

0.2

  • readme.txt fix

0.1

  • Initial release (sponsored by Planeta Tangerina)
  • Tested with WordPress 5.6-alpha-49035 and WooCommerce 4.6.0-beta.1
